Content:

Pink and white magnolias. I love magnolia trees. ğŸ˜€ They are very beautiful to look at. ğŸ™‚

I aim to get him a sister soon, but maybe Julz will have to bc I get my computers (yes plural!) back on Mondayâ€¦ soâ€¦ we shall see non?

Title: I hope to God there will be a t-storm tonight bcâ€¦
Content:
It is very muggy out right now â€” perfect weather for a particularly nasty t-storm to start up. I happen to love t-stormsâ€¦ the louder and furious it is? The better. I witnessed a really strong one when I was living with Eleanor in Toronto. Wind was whipping the trees about, rain was driving, thunder and lightningâ€¦. epic.
My friend Irene caught this really awesome photo of an active t-storm.. she actually stood out on the stoop in the rain and captured this pictureâ€¦ idk if she has it on FB but, I can lookâ€¦ it is freakinâ€™ awesome!! I try and take pix of storms but they never really look that great. ğŸ™ Ah wellâ€¦
I watched a lot of Midsomer Murders. I am addicted to that show. ğŸ™‚ But I was watching an ep, where this dude was murdered but the blood, it looked like red paint or tapeâ€¦. lolâ€¦

I would love to sub to Britbox. I love every British show ever made. I am a true Anglophile. ğŸ˜€
My glasses are slipping down my nose, thatâ€™s how sweaty I am. Oof. I wish that relief would get itâ€™s arse in gear and do â€¦Â something! Seriously.
I am getting a little sleepy, soâ€¦ I will play on my 3DS XL for awhileâ€¦ I might go on my iPad and play Wordleâ€¦ I think Iâ€™ll do that maybe tomorrow??
I want to get more pokemon rom hacks for the 3DSâ€¦ Oh yeah! I want to tell yâ€™all something! I got a package from England the other day, and it was a really good condition Pokemon Emerald cartridgeâ€¦ IN A CONTAINER. Wow!! I havenâ€™t really tried it out bc I need to buy a VERY VERY old skool DS Phat in order to play it, or a Gameboy SP. I might next month, take money out, and then, go on Marketplace and get one or the other. ğŸ¤¬ Iâ€™m curious as to what is on there!!! ğŸ˜€ Do you think I should keep it or sell it? What is it worth I wonder???
Ehâ€¦ I hear it fetches a really good price. ğŸ™‚ Yay!!
Sammy

Title: Canadian gooses aka the Flying Kamekazeâ€¦
Content:
I just heard a Canada goose fly by. They are really cut-throat, and they have teeth (sharp!) on their tongues, if you can believe it. They are just as quintessentially Canadian as real beer, Quebec maple syrup and freeze your bahoonies off winters. Truly.
Enough about Canada. G is getting her comeuppance. The big C is backâ€¦ well.. it is ğŸ¤¬too bad, but what goes around comes aroundâ€¦ am I right???
Your Faithful Writer is fine. Holed up in my room bc of Gâ€™s constant staring at me. If you are going to talk smack about me or stare at me, be prepared to be avoided like the plague. Depending on my mood, Iâ€™ll either do that or tell you to ğŸ¤¬off. Take a picture, it lasts longer. OMG!!! @CelestialFlutter!! I just told my sister that I donâ€™t give two ducks about G. It works!
Much laterâ€¦
Just had supper. Very nice sesame chicken, rice and chicken balls, from Main Garden. Annaâ€™s birthday is on Tuesday but she is treatingÂ usÂ to Chinese. ğŸ˜® And, snacks and pop no doubt. Holy shit. ğŸ˜® ğŸ˜® ğŸ˜®
Anyways, thatâ€™s it from meâ€¦
Sammy
